mapper.insert: insert into gg_ythcjqk (id, isdel, data_flag, lrr_sfzh, lrsj, xgr_sfzh, xgsj, baqid, baqmc, rybh, ryxm, zwcj, dnacj, mfcj, sdqk, nyjc) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdel,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{dataFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lrrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lrsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{xgrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xgsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{baqid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{baqmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ryxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zwcj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dnacj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mfcj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sdqk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nyjc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update gg_ythcjqk set isdel = #{isdel,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, data_flag = #{dataFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lrr_sfzh = #{lrrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lrsj = #{lrsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, xgr_sfzh = #{xgrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xgsj = #{xgsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, baqid = #{baqid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, baqmc = #{baqmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rybh = #{rybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ryxm = #{ryxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zwcj = #{zwcj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dnacj = #{dnacj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mfcj = #{mfcj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sdqk = #{sdqk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nyjc = #{nyjc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, isdel, data_flag, lrr_sfzh, lrsj, xgr_sfzh, xgsj, baqid, baqmc, rybh, ryxm, zwcj, dnacj, mfcj, sdqk, nyjc from gg_ythcjqk where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and isdel != 1

select id, isdel, data_flag, lrr_sfzh, lrsj, xgr_sfzh, xgsj, baqid, baqmc, rybh, ryxm, zwcj, dnacj, mfcj, sdqk, nyjc from gg_ythcjqk where 1 = 1 and isdel = 0
and rybh = '${rybh}'
